page.title: 16MY SCHOOL
page.content: My school is a very small one with three classes and about eighty pupils. It is near the A20 main road and although it is very dangerous we have not had an accident since I started school. When I started here there were five classes and over one hundred pupils but the numbers have dropped a lot since then. The hall, television room and spare room are in the main building while the office and toilets are in a separate block that was once the wartime Air Raid Shelters. The canteen and hutted classrooms are at the rear of the school near the railway line. We pay three pounds a week dinner money and have different meals each day.
